channel.title: Release Notes - 2016 on Releases - aspose.com
channel.description: Recent content in Release Notes - 2016 on Releases - aspose.com

item.title: Aspose.Pdf for JasperReports 1.6.0
item.description: Public API Changes for Aspose.PDF for JasperReports 1.6.0 All internal classes and packages were moved into the package com.aspose.pdf.jrinternal.* to avoid conflicts with other libraries. Very old versions of JasperReports are not supported now. The baseline version is JasperReports 5.6.0, which was released on 2014-08-04. com.aspose.pdf.License has been moved into com.aspose.pdf.jr.License Packages are not binding with the jasper version anymore. The main package from now is com.
